assets.description: This demo showcases a tablet application for nurses in a hospital. The application uses beacon technology to automatically switch the floor plan when the nurse enters a new floor. All data is coming from Mobile Cloud Service. Push notification is sent when a new patient fall risk is identified. MCS analytics are used to keep track of the floor changes by nurses.
assets.name: Stryker – Bed Manufacturing (iOS)

The company’s e-commerce site provides its users with the usual mechanisms for buying, selling, paying, collecting, generating leads and comparing listings via e-commerce transactions. TechCo has  many backend suppliers .  For order fulfillment it is integrated with supplier’s backend Systems.

assets.description: MCS, IoT, and PCS form a state-of-the-art process management system aimed at improving the efficiency of retail store operations. PCS defines the processes, and IoT's stream explorer uses a real-time data stream analysis to kick off processes. The mobile channel is used by store employees to receive information about their task assignment and to interface with the process system. The mobile app leverages beacon technology to accurately position the user (store employees) inside the store and alert them of nearby tasks that need to be fulfilled.
assets.name: Retail Store Task Management (Android)

assets.description: The Integration Success Workshops (ISW) program is designed to enable the field and customers to learn and use key features of Oracle SOA Suite. The ISWs consist of bite-sized individual modules on different components of SOA. This allows SCs to focus on their areas of interest and come up to speed in a short time. The SCs can use the collateral available as part of ISWs to demo and highlight product capabilities to customers. Each module contains short presentations, demos and videos. There is also a ready-to-go Virtual Image (VBox) that is available to run live demos.
assets.name: Integration Success Workshop

assets.description: This is a one day customer workshop that provides a set of hands-on labs which give an overview of Oracle’s Database Cloud Service. Customers run the workshop from within a Virtual Box image that contains all the tools and utilities to connect to the Cloud environment and successfully complete the labs. The workshop can be delivered with GSE cloud accounts or inside a customers Public Cloud Account.
assets.name: Database Cloud Service Workshop

assets.description:
This integrated Cloud demonstration showcases the full life cycle of a permit application in a modern UI created for the City of Los Angeles. The demonstration begins with an inspector evaluating the current status of haulers and scheduling a new inspection through a online portal. When it is time to conduct the inspection a mobile application is leveraged to enter the required information into a tablet on-site. The application can work online or offline in a seamless manner for the inspector. Enable the capture and submission of pictures, while monitoring the process through detail audit reports from start to finish.

For more information or a live demonstration please contact Francisco Brita by pressing the contact button below.
assets.name: LA Bureau of Sanitation

assets.description: Have you ever wished you could demonstrate how powerful Oracle PAAS is holistically? Today we are working to build a integrated PAAS demonstration that will showcase DBCS, JCS, MCS, ICS, PCS and DOCs ... This demonstration will highlight the true power of Oracle Public Cloud
assets.name: Integrated PAAS Demonstration

assets.description: This demonstration illustrates how a marketing team would use Oracle Documents Cloud Service to easily and efficiently collaborate with a 3rd-party digital marketing agency to develop digital assets, and then publish those assets to internal and external users. It shows how organizations can drive efficiencies via the seamless collaboration and content management capabilities of Oracle Documents Cloud Service for Secure External Agency Collaboration , Sales and Partner Enablement , Anywhere, Any Device Mobile Support.
assets.name: Digital Workspace Collaboration

assets.description: Database Security golden pitch powerpoint decks for reps and SC's use with customer audiences.  Two versions of "Anatomy of a Breach" are provided to highlight Oracle's "Security DNA" for either technical or executive audiences.
assets.name: Database Security Golden Pitch

assets.description:
Ever wonder how OPC compares to on premise in the real world? Well now you can find out through SQL Performance Analyzer. In this demonstration we will execute a real world workload test on a On Premise Oracle 11gR2 Database and Oracle Public Cloud 12c Pluggable Database Service. Once completed we will generate reports and compare the results.

If you like this demonstration you may also like our four other performance and management demonstrations also available on this page.
assets.name: On-Prem verse OPC Workload Testing Demonstration

assets.name: GSE Demo Store Big Data Demos - GSE Contributed

assets.description:
OPC: This is an API Gem, this translates all of the REST calls published by OPC to Ruby methods. This Gem is a dependency for the other two Gems, it also allows customers that have a Ruby development practice to write their own code and leverage our cloud.
knife-oracle_public_cloud:This Gem integrates with Chef, knife is the base command line tool for Chef. This Gem allows users to leverage the out of the box Chef knife command with options to create, list DBC, JCS, and storage containers in OPC. It also registers the DBCS and JCS instance to the users Chef Organization, it does not for storage as it not a VM. The command also automatically installs the Chef-client on the server during the creation process, allowing users to fully configure a server in OPC from a single command..
oracle_public_cloud_client:This is a command line utility for both Linux and Windows to manage OPC. This removes the need for CURL completely. For storage it removes the need to run Curl twice and having to copy and paste the Authorization Key into the second CURL command. It allows users to manage their OPC Domain via command line like they would any other shell command, i.e to create a new storage container it would be storagecreate –u username –p password –i ID Domain –c Container to be created
assets.name: Cloud Gems - REST to Ruby / Chef knife commands / OPC Command Line

assets.description: This is the Oracle Directory Services Plus (ODS+) Demonstration Kit version 11gR2PS3. This kit is for Sales Consultant use ONLY for the purpose of equipping SCs to deliver simple demonstrations and Proofs of Concept (PoC) of all the products in the ODS+ suite.
assets.name: Oracle Directory Services Plus (ODS+) Demonstration Kit

assets.createdBy: NAS Innovation and Shared Services with the Product Ambassadors
assets.description: The Lift & Shift demonstration showcases Oracle Enterprise Manager 12c and the Hybrid Cloud Gateway to move a 9GB 12c Pluggable Database and a J2EE from on-premise into the Database Cloud Service and the Java Cloud Service in about 15 minutes. The demonstration is preceeded by a short stoyline introducing Howard, an IT Manager trying to meet a tight deadline while meeting the needs of the VP of Development, the VP of Operations and the CIO. It is a tall task for Howard, but with Enteprise Manager 12c and the Oracle Public Cloud, success is easier than ever before.
assets.name: Lift & Shift Demonstration

assets.description: Developing initial sizing will help you and your team understand the potential deal size, as well as developing high level estimates as to the number of service instances and their configuration to support the customer solution architectures.  What are the different Database or Java Cloud compute shapes, how many unique instances, or variations of services are required?  How many users or transactions are to be supported by non-metered services?  Begin to develop your customer’s Cloud Service Portfolio, and your Bill of Materials.

The goal is for participants to quickly become familiar with WebLogic Server and understand some of its most important capabilities.

assets.description:
The Public Sector Mobile Showcase demonstrates the power of the Oracle Mobile Application Framework (MAF) development environment. More importantly, they show the value of utilizing mobility in government, healthcare, and higher education enterprises. All of the showcase applications include integrated Oracle mobile messaging and high level integration story arcs.

The solutions were a joint development project with a partner Softbang and many of the applications can be downloaded directly to your Android or iOS device.

assets.description: The purpose of this demo is to showcase capability of BICS to help federal state governments manage refugees. The demo provides insights into refugee inflow and accommodation per location. The Apex applications are leveraged to search and edit refugee/location details. The demo provides an option to assign a refugee to a different location to maintain optimum capacity. There are some advanced analytics reports which include liner regression, moving average etc.
assets.name: BICS Refuge Use Case Demo

assets.createdBy: Public Sector NAS Advanced Engineering Group
assets.description:
This cross pillar demonstration begins with a fully developed Portal in Oracle Webcenter using a custom template. Inside the portal citizens can view available services, register, check eligibility for benefits and manage/monitor the benefits process. Over time if circumstances change, the citizen can update his or her information and receive immediate guidance on new eligibility.

For more information or a live demonstration please contact Francisco Brita by pressing the contact button below.
assets.name: Oklahoma DHS

assets.description:
This demo image is based on the OEP / SX virtual image produced by the OEP/SX team. For the Remote Patient Monitor use case, Ken added a JDeveloper test message generator patient data to simulate:

    Heart Rate
    White Blood Cell Count
    Respiratory Rate
    Body Temperature.

The test data is forwarded to  OEP, and Stream Explorer is then used to correlate these 4 streams and generate an Alert Exploration when 2 or more vital signs indicate a heightened risk of SIRS (Systemic Inflammatory Response Syndrome) which is a common and serious condition for acute-care patients and outpatients at risk of readmission. Refer to this Wikipedia article for an overview of the business rules used by Stream Explorer to correlate and query these data streams
assets.name: OEP/SX Remote Patient Monitor Demo

assets.description: This workshop will provide your customers with an overview of Cloud Services and Public Cloud options. During the workshop your end user will create and explore the Java Cloud Service, check code out off and back into a Developer Cloud Service, and then deploy the application to the JCS. During the labs the customer will also connect the JCS to a companion Database Service. After the labs are done, the end user will have a working mobile application that access the JCS they created.
assets.name: Java Cloud Service Workshop
